title: Ziwei Doushu - Enhanced Curriculum with Multi-Source Comparisons
description: Comprehensive curriculum with detailed information from 3 authoritative sources for each level

source1.name: 王亭之 (Wang Tingzhi) - Zhongzhou School
source1.expertise: Modern interpretations of traditional Ziwei Doushu
source1.approach: Philosophical, adapting ancient texts to modern contexts
key_books: 紫微斗數講義(一)之十四正曜
紫微斗數講義(二)之星曜的特性
source1.philosophy: Destiny can be changed through understanding; not purely fatalistic

source2.name: 科技紫微網 (Keji Ziwei) - Zhang Sheng-shu
source2.philosophy: Making fortune-telling scientifically rigorous and practically applicable

source3.name: 星林學苑 (Xinglin Academy) - Contemporary Research
source3.expertise: Step-by-step systematic teaching with rich examples
source3.philosophy: Comprehensive learning through systematic case analysis

level_1_foundations.name: Level 1: Foundations (基礎)
level_1_foundations.description: Master the foundational metaphysical concepts required for all Chinese destiny systems

core_topics.importance: CRITICAL - Foundation of all Chinese metaphysics

wang_tingzhi.approach: Philosophical interpretation - balance principle, not just binary
wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 陰陽是相對的，非絕對的二元對立
wang_tingzhi.application: Understanding how stars interact based on yin-yang nature
wang_tingzhi.reference: 逢甲大學經濟學系研究資料

keji_ziwei.application: Categorizing all 12 palaces into yin-yang pairs

xinglin_academy.key_concept: 陰陽的動靜、升降、變化特性
xinglin_academy.application: Understanding palace movements and star transformations

core_topics.practice: Identify yin-yang nature of all 12 earthly branches

wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 五行生剋乘侮的完整關係
wang_tingzhi.application: How stars of different elements affect each other
wang_tingzhi.special: Considers not just generation/clash but also advantage/disadvantage

keji_ziwei.key_concept: 十天干的五行屬性決定四化表
keji_ziwei.application: Determining four transformation tables for any birth data
keji_ziwei.special: Emphasis on predictability through elemental systems

xinglin_academy.special: How elemental balance affects overall chart strength

core_topics.practice: Create 五行生剋圖 showing all relationships

wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 十天干代表十種精神特質

keji_ziwei.key_concept: 十天干的五行陰陽屬性表
keji_ziwei.application: Directly used to calculate four transformations table

xinglin_academy.key_concept: 天干與十天干四化表的關係

core_topics.practice: Memorize all 10 stems with their qualities; practice identifying stem from birth year

wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 十二地支對應十二個宇宙位置

keji_ziwei.key_concept: 十二地支與十二宮位的完全對應
keji_ziwei.application: Direct mapping to 12 palaces of destiny chart

xinglin_academy.key_concept: 地支的五行、陰陽、方位、季節完整對應
xinglin_academy.application: Understanding palace characteristics through earthly branches

core_topics.practice: Create 12-point star diagram with all branch correspondences

source_comparison.wang_tingzhi: Emphasizes philosophical meaning and spiritual principles underlying the systems
source_comparison.keji_ziwei: Focuses on practical application and mathematical precision in calculations
source_comparison.xinglin_academy: Provides step-by-step systematic integration with detailed case examples

level_1_foundations.key_takeaway: Foundation level requires understanding that all 12 palaces of Ziwei Doushu are directly mapped to the 12 earthly branches, and that the 10 heavenly stems generate the four transformations unique to Ziwei prediction

level_2_basic_system.name: Level 2: Basic Ziwei System (紫微基礎)
level_2_basic_system.description: Learn the core structure of Ziwei Doushu: the 12 palaces, 14 main stars, and chart construction

core_topics.topic: 十二宮位完整體系 (Complete 12-Palace System)
core_topics.importance: CRITICAL - The container for all information

wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 六親宮與人事宮的平衡
classification: 六親宮 (6 Relatives): 福德、父母、命、兄弟、夫妻、子女
人事宮 (6 Affairs): 財帛、疾厄、遷移、僕役、官祿、田宅
wang_tingzhi.emphasis: Understanding palace interactions rather than isolated meaning

keji_ziwei.key_concept: 十二宮位涵蓋人生全部領域
keji_ziwei.emphasis: Each palace has measurable impacts on specific life areas

xinglin_academy.key_concept: 宮位的位置決定其特性
xinglin_academy.emphasis: How main palace, facing palaces, and opposing palaces interact

core_topics.practice: Map all 12 palaces on personal birth chart; identify three-palace-four-positives

core_topics.importance: CRITICAL - The protagonists of the chart

wang_tingzhi.total_stars: 145 stars in Zhongzhou school (but focus on 14 main)
wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 十四主星代表十四種人格原型
wang_tingzhi.emphasis: Each star has inherent qualities independent of palace

keji_ziwei.key_concept: 主星特性決定人生基調
keji_ziwei.emphasis: Temples vs. Declines determine expression level

xinglin_academy.method: Real chart examples with detailed analysis
xinglin_academy.key_concept: 同星不同人，須考量宮位和輔星
xinglin_academy.emphasis: Context (palace + supporting stars) modifies base meaning

temple_concept.定義: 廟代表星曜力量最強，優點發揮最充分

core_topics.practice: Study each main star's nature; identify temple/decline positions; analyze personal chart main star

wang_tingzhi.key_concept: 排盤的邏輯是按宇宙秩序

keji_ziwei.key_concept: 理解排盤邏輯勝於手工排盤

xinglin_academy.method: 手工排盤教程 with detailed instructions

construction_steps.name: 定命身宮 (Determine Life & Body Palaces)
construction_steps.description: Calculate based on lunar month and hour

construction_steps.name: 定五行局 (Determine Five-Element Structure)
construction_steps.description: Identifies the 5-element framework of the chart

construction_steps.name: 安十四主星 (Place 14 Main Stars)
construction_steps.description: Position stars according to five-element system

construction_steps.name: 安輔星與煞星 (Place Assistant & Affliction Stars)
construction_steps.description: Add 6 auspicious and 6 inauspicious supporting stars

construction_steps.name: 安四化星 (Place Four Transformations)
construction_steps.description: Mark the transformation stars based on heavenly stems

core_topics.practice: Generate 3 charts using software; understand each step; manually construct one chart

source_comparison.keji_ziwei: Practical efficiency, using modern tools effectively

level_2_basic_system.key_takeaway: By end of Level 2, should be able to generate and read a basic chart, identifying main stars and their temple strength in relevant palaces

level_3_to_6_advanced.description: Detailed content for Levels 3-6 to follow in separate sections
level_3_to_6_advanced.note: Levels 3-6 represent increasingly complex synthesis of earlier learning with specialized focus areas
